name: Nexius
overview: Nexius, Inc. provides wireless consulting and radio frequency engineering services. It offers advice to a host of telecommunication operators, vendors, and investors on wireless technologies; and helps operators devise technology strategies. The company also offers engineering services, including network design and deployment; tuning and radio frequency optimization; and vendor management. In addition, Nexius offers software-focused services, including business analysis, software roadmap strategies, software and systems architecture development, software implementation, testing, and software project management services. Further, it offers various solutions, including XPLORE, a network and business intelligence platform, which helps wireless operators in analyzing and leveraging their complex operational data; XconfiG, a multi-technology network configuration management tool that helps wireless operators to analyze, modify, manage, and monitor their network elements configuration; and WiPAT, a service quality measurement tool, which supports new services using software plug-ins. Nexius serves regional, national, and international wireless operators; hardware and software product companies; equipment vendors; government agencies; contractors and system integrators; and enterprises. Nexius, Inc. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Herndon, Virginia with additional offices in Chicago, Illinois; Bellevue, Washington; Irving and Plano, Texas; Walnut Creek, California; Overland Park, Kansas; Parsippany, New Jersey; Dubai, the United Arab Emirates; CÃ³rdoba, Argentina; and Bucharest, Romania. As of July 1, 2010, Nexius, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of comScore, Inc.

acquisition.source_description: comScore Acquires Products Division Of Mobile Network Data Company Nexius For $24 Million
